channel.title: Vestige-x
channel.description: [center] [img]http://vestigex.com/forums/images/styles/vbskin_styles/vbsambient/images/logo.png[/img] How To Find Us: Website: [url=http://vestigex.com]Vestige-x - Index[/url] Forums: [url=http://vestigex.com/forums/forum.php] Vestige-x - Powered By Vbulletin[/url] Webclient: [url=http://vestigex.com/webclient.html]Vestige-x - Play Now[/url] Highscores: [url=http://vestigex.com/highscores/]Vestige-x - Highscores[/url] Facebook: [url=http://www.fb.com/vestigex317]Facebook - Vestige-x[/url] Background Information: Vestige-x is reborn. Back in early 2013 Vestige-x was released as a fun server for myself and peers to use. Upon advertising we reached a maximum of 74 users online. That's not as many as some servers, but it's the start to a community. Due to difficult circumstances Vestige-x was lost. Originally Vestige-x had a fair few bugs, exploits etc. I've made sure that i've done things properly this time. The re-creation began, This time a little more professionally. There's always room for improvement & we take suggestions on board. Features: *Hours Of Interaction *Custom NPC's *Custom Items *Custom Interfaces *Custom Minigames *Tokhaar Minigame *Gambling *Staking *Achievements *Custom Titles *Loyalty System *Veteran System *Money Pouch *Full Screen *All Working Skills Including Dungeoneering *Perfect PvM *Perfect PvP *Summoning Including Storage *Economy *Highscores *Vbulletin Forums Media: http://

item.title: Vestige-x
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Your homepage looks weird and out of porition, as if the links in the middle are simply smacked there. And those forums man… I’m assuming it was recently created but oh Lord… those ranks… those colors do not go together with those crowns except perhaps the administrator one.

Why would you put orange with a green crown like that, no. And why is a group called ‘f’ with an extremely ugly crown and that color.

Other than that, I wish for the best for the server - some interesting models.

Read full topic

item.title: Vestige-x
item.dc:creator: @Rayne-vx Rayne-vx
item.description:
@Rayne-vx wrote:

[center]

How To Find Us:

Website: Vestige-x - Index
Forums: Vestige-x - Powered By Vbulletin
Webclient: Vestige-x - Play Now
Highscores: Vestige-x - Highscores
Facebook: Facebook - Vestige-x
Background Information:

Vestige-x is reborn. Back in early 2013 Vestige-x was released as a fun server for myself and peers to use. Upon advertising we reached a maximum of 74 users online. That’s not as many as some servers, but it’s the start to a community. Due to difficult circumstances Vestige-x was lost.

Originally Vestige-x had a fair few bugs, exploits etc. I’ve made sure that i’ve done things properly this time.

The re-creation began, This time a little more professionally.
There’s always room for improvement & we take suggestions on board.
Features:

*Hours Of Interaction
*Custom NPC’s
*Custom Items
*Custom Interfaces
*Custom Minigames
*Tokhaar Minigame
*Gambling
*Staking
*Achievements
*Custom Titles
*Loyalty System
*Veteran System
*Money Pouch
*Full Screen
*All Working Skills Including Dungeoneering
*Perfect PvM
*Perfect PvP
*Summoning Including Storage
*Economy
*Highscores
*Vbulletin Forums
Media:
http://<a href="http://videobam.com/…com/gQaWy
*This video is WiP. This is not the final product.

Pictures











Before you leave negative feedback, Please be aware there are many people who release server that are 99.9% leeched, I have put time into this, although it isnt 100% my work please bare in mind everyone has their own style, This is mine, I personally wouldn’t bash anyones work, If you’re trying, you’re doing enough in my eyes. Thanks for reading.[/center]

Read full topic
